Title: Establishes guidelines for DAs with regard to electronic conversion of certain records, books or papers in the care or custody of DAs that are more than ten years old
Summary: Relates to establishing guidelines for DAs with regard to electronic conversion of certain records, books or papers in the care or custody of DAs that are more than 10 years old.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, establishing guidelines for district attorneys with regard to electronic conversions of certain records, books or papers in the care, custody or control of the district attorney which are more than ten years old
